# zendesk_organization_memberships (Resource)

Provides an organization membership resource.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# API reference:
#   https://developer.zendesk.com/api-reference/ticketing/users/organization_memberships/

resource "zendesk_organization_memberships" "example" {
  user_id         = 12345
  organization_id = 67890
  default         = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `organization_id` (Number) The ID of the organization.
- `user_id` (Number) The ID of the user.

### Optional

- `default` (Boolean) Whether this is the default organization membership for the user. Defaults to `false`.
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The time the organization membership was created.
- `updated_at` (String) The time the organization membership was last updated.
- `url` (String) The API url of this organization membership.

## Notes

- Organization memberships are immutable. The `user_id` and `organization_id` fields are marked as `ForceNew`, meaning any change to these fields will result in the resource being recreated.
